channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 AI stocks to play if you want to look past the Nvidia hardware build-out
JD Vance blasted on Vermont ski trip for Zelenskyy clash
item.description: Protesters held signs that said "Vance is a traitor go ski in Russia" and "Stand with Ukraine."

item.title: What Nvidia’s market valuation says about where the stock will be in 5 years
U.S. stocks open March higher; bitcoin consolidates after weekend surge
Trump signs order making English the official U.S. language
item.description: President Donald Trump on Saturday signed an executive order making English the official language of the United States.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent says Trump tariffs won't cause inflation to increase
item.description: The Treasury secretary's comments come just two days before the tariffs are scheduled to go into effect.

item.title: Trump’s proposed tariffs have already hurt the U.S. auto industry
Ray Dalio warns U.S. could face a debt-crisis ‘heart attack’ within three years
After Trump clash, Ukraine's Zelenskyy gets warm UK welcome before European summit
EU leaders prepare 'concrete' measures on defense financing, sources say
item.description: The EU is expected to announce "concrete" measures on boosting defense financing this week, sources said, as Europe and the U.S. clash over support fo...
